definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: write (NH id.; Ph. [[כתב]]; Aram. [[כְּתַב]], ktab Nab. [[כתב]], v. esp. Nö in Eut:Nab. p. 43; thence Ar. kataba Eth. kt4b: book, Di:Lex. 852 (as loan-wds., Frä:249 DHM:VOJ i (1887), 29); MV Buhl comp. Ar. kataba draw or sew together, conjoin (letters), etc., cf. Fl:ZMG 1873, 427)—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: c. acc., words Ex 34:27, commandments Ex 24:12, etc.; acc. cogn. [[מכתב]] Ex 39:30, cf. [[כַּמִּכְתָּב]] De 10:4; with [[כְּ]], giving purport of writing, also Es 8:8; but obj. also a book, [[סֵפֶר]] Ex 32:32, De 24:1; [[מְגִלָּה]] Je 38:6, cf. pt. pass, [[וְהִיא כְּתוּבָה פָּנִים וְאָחוֹר]] Ez Eze 2:10 ( of [[מגלה]]; i.e. written on both sides); a letter, [[סֵפָר]] 2Sa 11:14, 2Ki 10:1 + 4 t., [[אִגֶּרֶת]] 2Ch 30:1; a divorce-certificate [[סֵפֶר כְּרִיתֻת]] De 24:1, etc.; even [[לֻחׂת כְּתֻבִים]] tablets inscribed by the finger of God Ex 31:18 cf. De 9:10; [[מִשְּׁנֵי עֶבְרֵיהֶם]] ´[[כ]] ´[[ל]] Ex 32:15 tables inscribed on both sides (cf. Ez Eze 2:10 supr.) Here belongs (prob.) ´[[וְזֶה יִכְתּׂב יׇדוֹ לי]] Is 44:5 and this one shall inscribe his hand, ‘Yahweh's’, so LXX Hi Kn Che Br Du Di, Ges Ew De, shall sign (with) his hand unto ´[[י]].

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: more often write something on, or in ([[עַל־]] 85 t., [[בְ]] 44 t., [[אֶל־]] 3 t.) a tablet, roll, book, etc. (obj. various, as above):—(I) [[עַל־]] ´[[כ]] sq. [[סֵפֶר]] = book De 17:18 + 55 t., esp. in phr. ´[[כתובים על־ספר דברי וגו]] 1Ki 11:41 + oft. K Ch; [[עַל־מְגִּלָּה]] ´[[כ]] Je 36:2, Je 36:28, Je 36:32, 38:29; ([[ות]])[[עַל־לוּח]] ´[[כ]] Ex 34:1 + 7 t., [[עַל־אֶבֶן]] De 27:3 + 2 t., [[עַל־גּלָּיוֹן]] Is 8:1; [[עַל־מְזֻזוֹת בַּיִת]] De 6:9, De 11:20; [[עַל־מַטֶּה]] on a rod Nu 17:17, Nu 17:3; [[עַל־עֵץ]] Ez Eze 37:16, Eze 37:16, [[עַל־חִיץ]] (high priest's plate) Ex 39:30; even (only Ch) [[עַל־]] sq. name of book or its contents:—[[עַל־דִּבְרֵי נׇתָן]] ´[[כ]] 2Ch 9:29 cf. 2Ch 33:19; ´[[עַל־מִדְרַשׁ וגו]] 2Ch 24:27; [[עַל־הַקִּינוֹת]] 2Ch 35:25; fig., [[עַל־לִבָּם]] ´[[כ]] Je 31:83 I will write them upon their heart; cf. [[עַל־לוּחַ לִבְֶָּ]] ´[[כ]] Pr 3:3. (2) [[אֶל־]] ´[[כ]] appears for [[עַל־]] ´[[כ]] only Je 36:2 cf. Ez Eze 2:10, Je 51:60. (3) [[בְּ]] ´[[כ]] sq. [[ספר]] = book Jos 24:26 (E) + 35 t.; = letter, bill, deed, 1Ki 21:9 + 5 t.; [[בִּמְגִלַּת]] [[סֵפֶר כָּתוּב עָלָָי]] Ps 40:8 it is prescribed to me, [[על]] as 2Ki 22:13 (N.B. [[על־]] ´[[כ]] not used with [[סֵפֶר]] = letter, and [[בְּ]] ´[[כ]] not used with [[לוּחַ]], [[אבן]] or [[עֵץ]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: other uses of perp. with ´[[כ]] are:—[[בְּ]] instr., [[בְּחֶרֶט אֱנוֹשׁ]] ´[[כ]] Is 8:1, [[בְּעֵט בַּרְזֶל]] ´[[כ]] Je 17:1; [[כְּתֻבִים]] [[בְּאֶחְבַּע אֱלֽהִים]] De 9:10, Ex 31:18; [[אֶל־]] ´[[כ]] unto, of person to whom letter, etc., is addressed 2Sa 11:14, 2Ki 10:6, Es 9:13; [[עַל־]] subst. for [[אֶל־]] (late) 2Ch 30:1, Ezr 4:7, Es 8:8; the fuller construction is ([[אֶל־]])[[ספר וישׁלח ]] ´[[כ]] 2Ki 10:1, Es 8:10, Es 9:20 + ; [[אֶל־]] ´[[כ]] write down for the benefit or use of some one, Ju Jdg 8:14; [[לְ]] to or for, De 17:18, De 24:1 + ; note esp. [[אֶכְתָּו֠ב־לוֹ רֻבֵּו֠ תּוֹרָתִי]] Ho 8:12, i.e. either, I write (keep writing) for them ever so many (We, [[רׂב]], cf. rub= Ew and most ([[א]])[[רִבּוֹ]] a myriad) of my directions, or ‘Though I write,’ ‘Were I to write,’ etc.; ´[[כ]] sq. [[ל]] c. inf. of purpose 2Ch 32:17, Es 8:5; c. [[מִן]] in phr. ´[[מִפִּי פ]] ´[[כ]] write from the mouth of  any one i.e. from dictation, † Je 36:2, Je 36:32, Je 38:6, Je 38:17, Je 38:27, Je 45:1.
= write down describe in writing, [[אֶת־הָאָרֶץ]] ´[[כ]] Ju Jdg 18:4, Jdg 18:6, Jdg 18:8, Jdg 18:8, Jdg 18:8, Jdg 18:9.

= register enroll Is 10:19 (= record the number), 1Ch 24:6; esp. pass. [[הַכְּתוּבִים]] Nu 11:26 those enrolled cf. Ne 12:22; [[בְּשֵׁמוֹת]] ´[[הַכּ]] 1Ch 4:41 those recorded by name; in prediction, [[אֶת־הָאִישׁ]] ´[[כ]] [[הַזֶּה עֲרִירִי]] Je 22:30 register this man as childless; with eschatol. reference, [[כָּל־הַכָּתוּב לַחַיִּים]] Is 4:3 all those enrolled (i.e. appointed) unto life; and, more explicitly, [[כָּל־הַנִּמְחָא כָּתוּב בַּסֵּפֶר]] Da 12:1; [[יִסְפּׂר בִּכְתוֹבּ עַמִּים]] ´[[י]] Ps 87:6 ´[[י]] shall reckon, when he registers (note absence of suffix) the peoples, etc.
= decree, [[תִּכְתּׂב עָלַי מְרׂרוֹת]] Job 13:26 thou (´[[י]]) decrest against me bitter things. †

be written, subj. words Job 19:23, book Mal 3:16; be written [[בְּסֵפֶר]] Es 2:23, Es 9:23, in, or among [[ב]] the laws Es 1:19; once, c. [[עַל־]], [[עַל־סִפְרְ ְכֻּלָּם יִכָּתֵָבוּ]] Ps 139:16 in thy ´[[י]]'s book all of them (my members) are written, i.e. written down, recorded (v. infr.); abs. [[כְּתָב אֲשֶׁר נִכְתָּב]] [[בְּשֵׁם הַמֶּלֶךְ]] Es 8:8 a writing which is written in the king's name, cf. (impers.) Es 3:12; impers. also [[וַיִּכָּתֵב כְּכָל־אֲשֶׁר חִוׇּה]] Es 3:12, Es 8:9; ´[[יִכָּ]] sq. [[לְ]] = for Ps 102:19; sq. [[לְ]] + inf. (really = a subject-cl.,—the contents of the letter) Es 3:9, Es 8:5.

be written down, recorded, Ezr 8:34; enrolled, [[בִּכְתָב]] [[בית ישׂראל לאׁ יִכָּתֵָבוּ]] Ez Eze 13:9 in the enrolement of the house of Israel they are not enrolled (eschatolog.); [[וְעִם־חַדִּיקִים אַל־יִכָּתֵָבוּ]] Ps 69:29 ( ‖[[חַיִּים יִמָּחוּ מִסֵּפֶר ]]).—[[בָּאָרֶץ יִכָּתֵָבוּ]] Je 17:13 is difficult; Gie rds., plausibly, [[מֵאֶרֶץ יִכָּרֵָתוּ]] (cf. Ps 34:17, Ps 101:8, etc.) †
